name: Office Rage
description:
You work at a simple office job, you are at the spring of your life but you feel like you are wasting it, but everybody has to pay the bills somehow, with no promotion in sight you try to keep an optimistic view. But today you learn that you have been fired, your boss and bum-licking co-workers are not going to have a good day.

Controls
WASD-Movement
E-Light Attacks
Q-Heavy Attacks
C-Block
